title: App Mode and Cluster Mode
description: Palette supports two consumption modes - each aimed at different use cases and, potentially, different personas. The two modes are App Mode and Cluster Mode.  These modes can be used separately but often work together by sharing resources or relying on resources that each provides.

frontMatter.title: App Mode and Cluster Mode
frontMatter.metaDescription: Learn about the two modes available in Palette and how they benefit your Kubernetes experience.
